por.deposit_info_arca:
"Armenian Card" CJSC was established by the Central Bank of RA and 10 commercial banks in March 2000 for the establishment and development of the new banking payment system in Armenia. The company provides a set of services that allows banks to issue and serve ArCa, MasterCard, VISA cards, also to serve Armenian Express cards using modern technical, technological and software opportunities of the processing center using also specialized support of the company. The company is:
  • Full member of international payment system of MasterCard Europe and the Centre for the provision of processing services (Member Service Provider)
  • Center to provide processing services for the system VISA (Third Party Processor)
  • Center to provide processing services for the system of American Express (Third Party Processor)
por.deposit_info_astropay: AstroPay Card - our anonymous, virtual prepaid card and e-wallet, for customers who dont want to expose their personal information when making online transactions. Register for free, choose the value of the card you want to purchase and pay in local currency using the most popular payment methods in your country.It is an immediate solution. Simply purchase your card, make your payment and receive an e-mail with your AstroPay Card details ready for use.
por.deposit_info_btabank:
It is of capital importance for Vbet to provide its clients with up-to-date, trustworthy and comfortable payment services.
You can henceforth replenish your VBET account through the BTA BANK.
BTA Bank JSC functions on the basis of license N31, provided by the Central Bank of the Republic of Armenia.
Through BTA BANK JSC you can pay for fixed line and mobile networks, public service and digital wallets.
por.deposit_info_cash:
To deposit money you should tell the bookmaker-cashier your VivaroBet account number which you were granted after the registration on our website.

At Baghramyan 1, Andranik 73/5, Komitas 60 and N.Zaryan sidestreet 1, h. 9 you can replenish your game account and receive your winning 24/7. In other betting offices you can replenish your game account and receive your winning from 14:00 till 23:00.

The addresses of betting offices where you can deposit cash money.
por.deposit_info_cashbill: CashBill is a global settlement system enabling internet users to conduct safe money transfers in real time. Funds will be transfered to your account immediately. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don't have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To deposit funds into your account using CashBill, simply press deposit after entering your login & amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to CashBill to complete your transaction. Please note that you must have bank account in PLN currency to use this payment method.
por.deposit_info_centili:
Mobile Payment - You can easily pay with your phone in no time. The amount is automatically added to your mobile phone bill or deducted from your prepaid account, so you do not need a credit card or a bank account. Simply pay by mobile and enjoy! Currencies supported - RUB. To make a deposit at Vbet please fill in the sum and then your mobile phone number. You will recieive an SMS asking to confirm the payment by answering it with a specific number. After confirmation the payment is done.

Please read the following:
1. This Payment System is only for Beeline Russia customers.
2. After payment there should be minimum 50 RUB left on your mobile account.
3. Commission for deposit is 8%
por.deposit_info_dotpay: Dotpay is a big Polish payment aggregator, which enables payments from different European banks through internet banking.
por.deposit_info_ecocard:
EcoPayz is a global payment solutions provider offering instant safe and convenient payment services to customers and businesses across the globe.
Supported currencies include EUR, RUB and USD.
Funds will be transferred to your Vbet account immediately.
There are no fees for using this payment method.
Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value.
To deposit funds into your Vbet account using ecoPayz, simply press deposit after entering the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to ecoPayz to complete your transaction.
por.deposit_info_edram: IDram is a payment system on the Internet. For realization of payment it is necessary to be registered in IDram system. IDram system does not demand loading the additional program. On a special page you can expose to yourselves the account for the necessary sum and pay it in IDram system. After that it is necessary to check up the status of the exposed account on the same page. If it has been paid, your game account will be replenished with the transferred sum. For input of money into the system it is necessary to buy а card IDram through branches of "ArmPost" communication. It is possible to familiarize with the rules of the system on the website www.idram.am. There are no expenses for this payment method.
por.deposit_info_interkassa:
Interkassa – the system for receiving and payments in real time.The service has a lot of advantages over a disparate network of payment systems. So, with her help, you, as the buyer can make payment without leaving your own home. The firm is a legal entity, thereby is responsible for the safety of users and the reliability of the encryption transaction.
Intercash has established itself on the positive side, as evidenced by the number of people connected to Interkassa payment instruments including such as Visa, Master Card, Приват24, QIWI,Liqpay, W1, PerfectMoney, ADVcash, Terminals, Bitcoin, Ecoint, EXmo, Okpay, Payeer, Swift.

To funds to Your account with Interkassa , You must specify the amount of Deposit and press Deposit. After clicking the Deposit button, You will be automatically redirected to the payment processor's site to complete the transaction.
por.deposit_info_megapay:
"Mega Panther" LLC is a payment organization which represents MegaPay. The system operates through payment terminals. Via payment terminals you can pay for mobile and fixed telephony, gas, water, electricity, Internet, IP-telephony, commercial TV, Vivarobet, and etc. Payment terminals are the most modern way to pay your bills easily and quickly. Due to these modern methods of dialogue construction with client the process of financial operations becomes accessible, easy and gives an opportunity to serve the maximum number of people in a short period of time. There is no need of special explanation for using these terminals. Anyone can do the operation through the terminals;it is enough to follow the text and graphic instructions on the screen.

All payments are carried out in online operation mode by the simple touch on the screen. For all types of payments through MegaPay system no commission is collected – 0 %.

Payment system MegaPay is an optimal financial and technological solution, and payment terminal means comfortability along with availability.

Mega Panther LLC created stable software which is permanently improved for terminals. And our monitoring group is constantly observing terminals to reduce possible errors.

Half the success of any business is satisfied clients. Guided by this slogan Mega Panther LLC constantly improves MegaPay payment system, increases efficiency of payment terminals, works with its clients through the united call-center. As a result, day by day grows not only the quantity of services offered, but also the number of satisfied and loyal clients.
por.deposit_info_mobidram:
If you have a MobiDram account from now on you can top up your Vivaro account online via MobiDram. After login you should click "Deposit" button and then choose MobiDram. There you should fill in appropriate fields with data and confirm payment.
The whole amount will be transfered to your account.
por.deposit_info_moneta:
Moneta.ru is a payment system established in Russia to provide Internet users with the ability to make secure and instant transactions.

Supported currencies include EUR, RUB and USD. Funds will be transferred from your Vbet account within 72 hours. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To deposit funds from your Vbet account using Moneta.Ru, simply press deposit after enter the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to Moneta.Ru to complete your transaction.
por.deposit_info_neteller: Neteller gives users the ability to make secure online payments with a system offering instant deposits, withdrawals and payouts trusted by millions worldwide. Supported currencies include USD, EUR and RUB. Funds will be transferred to your Vbet account immediately. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To deposit funds into your Vbet account using Neteller, simply press deposit after entering your Neteller account number, Secure ID and the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to Neteller to complete your transaction. Please note that the e-mail address registered to your Neteller account must match the e-mail address registered to your Vbet account for your transaction to be accepted.
por.deposit_info_osmp:
"OSMP" LLC (United System of Instant Payments) - Armenian representative office of Russian "OSMP" CJSC which was set up in September, 2007.
RA Central Bank’s № 9 license from April 22, 2008 (payment system). RA Central Bank’s № 5 license from April 22, 2008 (processing and clearing of payments)
The System organizes acceptance of payments for the following services:
- mobile connection: Beeline, VivaCell-MTS;
- fixed connection;
- bookmaker offices (Vivarobet)
- payment systems (EDram)
- VoIP service (Kargin kap) – New.
- gaz service (ArmRusgazprom) – New.

As of 01.12.08, 28 payment terminals located in various districts of Yerevan and Ashtarak are functioning in the system.
Russian "OSMP" CJSC was founded in 2004. It possesses payment acceptance points in all regions of Russia. Aside from Armenia, the Company’s payment systems function in Georgia, Kazakhstan, Tajikistan, Uzbekistan, Ukraine, Moldova, Belarus.
por.deposit_info_paytopay:
If you have a MobiDram account from now on you can top up your Vivaro account by sending an SMS to 1009 short number mentioning the amount and Vivaro ID you want to top up. For example: 5000, 1234567.
The minimum amount for top up is 1000 AMD. The whole amount will be transfered to your account
por.deposit_info_qiwi:
QIWI is a digital wallet that can be used to send and receive money with a wide range of methods allowing for every user to choose what is most convenient and preferable. Supported currencies include EUR, RUB and USD. Funds will be transferred to your account within 72 hours.

There are no fees for using this payment method.

Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To deposit funds into your account using QIWI, simply press deposit after entering the phone number registered with QIWI and the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to QIWI to complete your transaction.
por.deposit_info_safecharge: SafeCharge is a leading global payment service provider of end-to-end payment acceptance and card issuing solutions. SafeCharge processes all major credit/debit cards as Visa and MasterCard, as well as hundreds of alternative payment methods for quick deposits and withdrawals.
por.deposit_info_skrill: Skrill é uma forma segura , conveniente e acessível para enviar e receber dinheiro em todo o mundo . As Moedas suportadas incluem euros e dólares. Os fundos serão transferidos para a conta imediatamente. Existem taxas a serem aplicadas por este método. Transferências não têm um valor mínimo e ou valor máximo. Para depositar fundos na sua conta IBETUP usando Skrill , basta pressionar depósito depois de entrar no endereço de e-mail registado na Skrill e a quantia que deseja transferir a seguir. Será redirecionado para Skrill para concluir a transação..
por.deposit_info_skrill_1tap:
Skrill 1-Tap is Skrill's convenient service that lets users make small transfers easily without the need to always re-enter an e-mail address and password.

Supported currencies include EUR and USD.
Funds will be transferred to your Vbet account immediately.
There are no fees for using this payment method.
The minimum for transfers is 5, the maximum is 1000.

To deposit funds into your Vbet account using Skrill 1-Tap, simply press “Deposit” entering the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to Skrill to complete your transaction.
Please note that you only have to enter your e-mail address for your first Skrill 1-Tap transaction. After the first time, your account information will be automatically recognized by the Skrill system.
por.deposit_info_tandem:
Tandem Payment
LLC, Tandem Payment LLC founded in 2007 practices setting, distribution and support of automatized payment systems. The payment terminals offered by our company guarantee quick, comfortable and foolproof method of billing, paying for public utilities, Internet, replenishment of accounts and etc. The software of Tandem PaymentÕs terminals is developed in RA by Smart-Tech LLC which has a great experience in development of various systems of e-payments such as ArCa portal and system of E-card Banking. This fact gives an opportunity to continually improve the system of payment terminals, to execute and apply different innovations into the system.
Our primary advantages are:

We work without commission (0%)
Our terminals enable to distribute paid-in sum of money among different types of services. (You can get more detailed information on these items on "for users" page).
Our operators work on a twenty-four hour basis and are always ready to answer your all questions concerning our system.
por.deposit_info_telcell: It is very important for "VivaroBet" company to provide its consumers with modern, reliable and convenient payment service. Therefore "VivaroBet" company has incorporated to system TelCell.
por.deposit_info_ukash: Ukash foi criado para dar um método fácil, seguro e privado para fazer pagamentos online usando dinheiro.As moedas suportados incluem euros e dólares. Os fundos serão transferidos para sua conta IBETUP imediatamente. Não há taxas para a utilização deste método de pagamento . Transferências não têm um valor máximo e ou mínimo. Para depositar fundos na sua conta IBETUP usando o Ukash , basta pressionar submit depois de inserir a quantidade que você deseja transferir. Será redirecionado para a página da Ukash deve digitar os detalhes do voucher da Ukash para concluir a transação.
por.deposit_info_webmoney:
WebMoney is a global settlement system enabling Internet users to conduct safe money transfers in real time. Supported currencies include EUR, RUB, UAH and USD. Funds will be transferred to your account immediately. There are no fees for using this payment method.

Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To deposit funds into your Vbet account using WebMoney, simply press deposit after entering the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to WebMoney to complete your transaction. Please note that you must have a WebMoney E, R or Z wallet.
por.deposit_info_wirecard: WireCard is a secure, convenient & fast way to deposit funds at your Vbet account using your credit card. The supported currencies are: EUR, USD, RUB, & UAH. The minimum deposit amount is 10 EUR and the maximum deposit amount is 5000 EUR. Funds will be transfered to your Vbet account immediately. There are no fees using this payment method. To deposit funds into your Vbet account using WireCard, simply fill out all the required fields and press the 'deposit' button.
por.deposit_info_yandex: "Yandex_Money" é um sistema de pagamento eletrônico, um dos serviços mais populares da empresa "Yandex", que é um dos maiores portais na Rússia e motor de busca na Internet russa. O sistema de pagamento "Yandex_Money" ajuda você a fazer compras em lojas online, contribuir para fundos de caridade, pagar serviços de comunicação e muito mais. Para mais informações e oportunidades no sistema de pagamentos "Yandex.Money", visite o website da money.yandex.
por.deposit_info_yandexprbank: You can replenish your account directly from your “PromSvyazBank” internet-bank account and in this case transfers are carried out via the payment system YandexMoney. "Yandex.Money" - an electronic payment system, one of the most popular services of "Yandex" company, which is Russia's largest portal and leading search system in Russian part of the Internet. "Yandex.Money" payment system helps you to make purchases from online stores, contribute to charity funds, pay for communication services and much more. For more information and opportunities on "Yandex.Money" payment system, visit the money.yandex.ru website.
por.freebet_info:
Vivaro betting company offers its customers a free quiz.
Customers will be offered 3 types of express, which contains 6, 8 or 10 events. If the customer guesses correctly 6 out of 6 events and the winning amount will be 7000 AMD, 8 out of 8 events the payout will be 15.000 AMD, and if you guess 10 out of 10 events the payoff will be 20.000 AMD. The winning amount will be transferred to the customer’s account within 5 days after completion of all events are included in all 3 express bets.
If there are events, which have not taken place in this variant of express, the quiz will be lost.
Each customer can daily make an express bet on each variant only once.
por.message_1008: Não pode fazer o login na página uma vez que ainda não activou a sua conta através do seu e.mail.
por.message_1026: You can make a new superbet only after the existing one is completed.
por.message_1102: O tempo do começo do jogo já passou

por.poker_download_description_android:
1. Antes de baixar, em Configurações do sistema selecione o item Segurança> Gerenciamento de Dispositivo> Permitir fontes desconhecidas.
  2. Para o correto funcionamento do programa, também deve ser instalado Adobe Air.
  3. Se as condições estiverem reunidas, você pode começar clicando no ícone para baixar o aplicativo.
  4. Depois da descarga bem sucedida, o software será instalado automaticamente.
  5. Após a instalação, inicie o programa, basta clicar sobre o ícone do programa.
por.poker_download_description_mac:
1. Descarga do pacote de aplicativos
  2. Retire o pacote de aplicativos clicando duas vezes
  3. Mova o pacote de aplicativos extraídos para Programas
  4. Clique pacote de aplicação em Programas para começar
por.poker_download_description_windows:
1. Uma janela irá aparecer. Pressione “Run”.
  2. Quando a descarga termine, você vai ser solicitado a verificar o editor.
  3. Pressione o botão "Run" novamente. again.
  4. Na próxima janela, para instalar o software, clique em “Next”.
  5. Quando a instalação for concluída, você pode encontrar o nosso ícone vBET Poker no seu escritório.
  6. Clique duas vezes no ícone para iniciar o salão de jogos de vBET.
por.poker_requirements_android:
Requisitos mínimos do sistema Android:
Uma versão instalada do Adobe Air (pode ser baixado aqui)
Versão do Android 4.0 ou superiorr
3G ou Wifi
por.poker_requirements_mac:
Requisitos mínimos do sistema Windows:Windows XP / Vista / Windows 7
Pentium 4 com 3 GHz (ou CPU compatível) Sistema RAM de
1 GB Ligação à Internet de banda larga
por.withdraw_info_arca:
The ordered sum is transferred to Armenian banks' ArCa, MasterCard, VISA cards you mentioned, which is registered in your name.
The order execution term is 24 hours.
Due to unstable operation of the system, transfer delay may exceed the specified time.
The minimal sum of withdrawal is 500 dram.
The maximum sum for withdraw is 100.000 dram per day.
No commissions are charged with this payment method.
por.withdraw_info_astropay: AstroPay Card - our anonymous, virtual prepaid card and e-wallet, for customers who don't want to expose their personal information when making on-line transactions. Register for free, choose the value of the card you want to purchase and pay in local currency using the most popular payment methods in your country. It is an immediate solution. Simply purchase your card, make your payment and receive an e-mail with your AstroPay Card details ready for use.
por.withdraw_info_cash:
You can receive the sum ordered in the betting offices on the same or next day after the registration of inquiry. You should present your passport to receive your winning. The order is valid within 3 days. If you cannot receive the winning sum during this term, the inquiry will be cancelled, the ordered sum will return on the game account. The minimal sum of the order is not limited. There are no additional charges for this payment method.

At Baghramyan 1, Andranik 73/5, Amiryan 18/2a you can receive your winnings from 11:00 till 23:00. In other betting offices you can receive your winnings from 14:00 till 23:00.

You can receive cash sum at the following branches of VivaroBet:
por.withdraw_info_ecocard:
ecoPayz is a global payment solutions provider offering instant safe and convenient payment services to customers and businesses across the globe.
Supported currencies include EUR, RUB and USD.
Funds will be transferred from your Vbet within 72 hours.
There are no fees for using this payment method.
Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value.
To withdraw funds from your Vbet account using ecoPayz, simply press withdraw after entering your full name, your account number and the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to ecoPayz to complete your transaction.
por.withdraw_info_edram: Your payout order will be transferred to your iDram account which is registered in your name. Execution term of the order is 12 hours. With this payment method you are not paying any commission.
por.withdraw_info_interkassa:
Interkassa – the system for receiving and payments in real time.The service has a lot of advantages over a disparate network of payment systems. So, with her help, you, as the buyer can make payment without leaving your own home. The firm is a legal entity, thereby is responsible for the safety of users and the reliability of the encryption transaction.
Intercash has established itself on the positive side, as evidenced by the number of people connected to Interkassa payment instruments, Including such asVisa, Master Card, Приват24, QIWI,Liqpay, W1, PerfectMoney, ADVcash, Terminals, Bitcoin, Ecoint, EXmo, Okpay, Payeer, Swift.

To withdraw funds from Your account to the site Napoleon Casino with the help of Interkassa, You must specify Your personal data, number of a purse registered in system and the amount of withdrawal, then click on the Output button.
por.withdraw_info_moneta:
Moneta.ru is a payment system established in Russia to provide Internet users with the ability to make secure and instant transactions.

Supported currencies include EUR, RUB and USD. Funds will be transferred from your Vbet account within 12 hours. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To withdraw funds from your Vbet account using Moneta.Ru, simply press withdraw after entering your full name, the e-mail address registered with Moneta.Ru, your Wallet Number and the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to Moneta.Ru to complete your transaction.
por.withdraw_info_neteller:
Neteller gives users the ability to make secure online payments with a system offering instant deposits, withdrawals and payouts trusted by millions worldwide.

Supported currencies include USD, EUR and RUB. Funds will be transferred from your Vbet account within 72 hours. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value.

To withdraw funds from your Vbet account using Neteller, simply press withdraw after entering your account number and the amount you want to transfer below.
por.withdraw_info_netellernew:
Neteller gives users the ability to make secure online payments with a system offering instant deposits, withdrawals and payouts trusted by millions worldwide.

Supported currencies include USD, EUR and RUB. Funds will be transferred from your Vbet account within 24 hours. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value.

To withdraw funds from your Vbet account using Neteller, simply press withdraw after entering your account number and the amount you want to transfer below.
por.withdraw_info_qiwi:
QIWI is a digital wallet that can be used to send and receive money with a wide range of methods allowing for every user to choose what is most convenient and preferable.

Supported currencies include EUR, RUB and USD. Funds will be transferred from your account within 72 hours. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum value, and the maximum value is 300 EUR. To withdraw funds from your account using QIWI, simply press withdraw after entering your QIWI Wallet Number and the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to QIWI to complete your transaction.
por.withdraw_info_safecharge: SafeCharge is a leading global payment service provider of end-to-end payment acceptance and card issuing solutions. SafeCharge processes all major credit/debit cards as Visa and MasterCard, as well as hundreds of alternative payment methods for quick deposits and withdrawals
por.withdraw_info_skrill:
Skrill is a secure, convenient and affordable way to send and receive money worldwide.

Supported currencies include EUR and USD.
Funds will be transferred from your account within 72 hours.
There are no fees for using this payment method.
Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value.
To withdraw funds from your Vbet account using Skrill, simply press “Submit” after entering your full name, your e-mail address registered with Skrill and the amount you want to transfer below. You will be redirected to Skrill to complete your transaction.
por.withdraw_info_topoker: If you have a VivaroPoker account, you can transfer money to it. Please enter your VivaroPoker username and password(you will be asked only for the first time) and chosen amount will be transferred to your VivaroPoker account
por.withdraw_info_tovivaropet: If you have a Vivarobet account, you can transfer money to it. Please enter your Vivarobet username and password(you will be asked only for the first time) and chosen amount will be transferred to your Vivarobet account
por.withdraw_info_webmoney: WebMoney is a global settlement system enabling Internet users to conduct safe money transfers in real time. Supported currencies include EUR, RUB, UAH and USD. Funds will be transferred from your account within 72 hours. There are no fees for using this payment method. Transfers don`t have a minimum and/or a maximum value. To withdraw funds from your Vbet account using WebMoney, simply press wirhdraw after entering your full name as registered with WebMoney, your Wallet Number and the amount you want to transfer below. Please note that you must have a WebMoney E, R or Z wallet.
por.withdraw_info_wirecard: WireCard is a secure, convenient  fast way to deposit and withdraw funds at your Vbet account using your credit card .
por.withdraw_info_wirecardnew: WireCard is a secure, convenient  fast way to deposit and withdraw funds at your Vbet account using your credit card.
